trans-unit.source: The 2012-02-12 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:
trans-unit.target: The 2012-02-12 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> now works asynchronously, and can copy from any Azure storage account.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> now works asynchronously, and can copy from any Azure storage account.

trans-unit.source: Containers can be leased, and all leases support shorter or infinite durations.
trans-unit.target: Containers can be leased, and all leases support shorter or infinite durations.

trans-unit.source: You must now provide a lease duration.
trans-unit.target: You must now provide a lease duration.

trans-unit.source: A released lease cannot be broken or renewed.
trans-unit.target: A released lease cannot be broken or renewed.

trans-unit.source: If you break a lease that is breaking or already broken, no error will occur.
trans-unit.target: If you break a lease that is breaking or already broken, no error will occur.

trans-unit.source: The lease ID of an active lease can be changed.
trans-unit.target: The lease ID of an active lease can be changed.

trans-unit.source: A lease ID can be included on an operation to acquire a lease.
trans-unit.target: A lease ID can be included on an operation to acquire a lease.

trans-unit.source: When breaking a lease, you can specify a period during which the lease should remain active.
trans-unit.target: When breaking a lease, you can specify a period during which the lease should remain active.

trans-unit.source: Table and Queue services now support shared access signatures.
trans-unit.target: Table and Queue services now support shared access signatures.

trans-unit.source: A shared access signature can live longer than an hour, even with no stored access policy.
trans-unit.target: A shared access signature can live longer than an hour, even with no stored access policy.

trans-unit.source: The Blob service now provides MD5 hashes for the <link xlink:href="b213c30f-8d30-4718-ba77-2030f3009719" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Blob (REST API)</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: The Blob service now provides MD5 hashes for the <link xlink:href="b213c30f-8d30-4718-ba77-2030f3009719" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Blob (REST API)</link> operation.
